report.title: Sample records list
report.description: Details all occurrences associated with a top level sample. 2nd version of report for my_dot_map form
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN occurrences occ on occ.id=o.id AND occ.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id LEFT JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttlcomm on ttlcomm.taxon_meaning_id=o.taxon_meaning_id AND ttlcomm.language_iso='#language#' LEFT JOIN (occurrence_attribute_values oav JOIN occurrence_attributes oa on oa.id=oav.occurrence_attribute_id and oa.deleted=false and oa.system_function='sex_stage_count' ) on oav.occurrence_id=o.id and oav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms abund on abund.termlist_id=oa.termlist_id and abund.id=oav.int_value WHERE o.sample_id=#sample_id#

param.name: sample_id
param.description: ID of sample to return data for

param.name: language
param.description: ISO code of language for common names
